title: Section Semantic Element
description: Generic thematic grouping of content. Used when article is not appropriate.

$inheritance.reason: Section IS-A element with all base properties

semanticMeaning.description: A generic standalone section of content that doesn't have a more specific semantic element
semanticMeaning.whenToUse: When content is thematically related but not self-contained like article
semanticMeaning.whenNotToUse: Don't use as generic container - use div instead

structure.notes: Section should generally have a heading

requirements: Almost always should have a heading
Use aria-label if heading is not visible
